{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{tcp6__acceptor_8h_a4ca3d1d7a52f89da94e969bf19a872e0} 
using \mbox{\hyperlink{tcp6__acceptor_8h_a4ca3d1d7a52f89da94e969bf19a872e0}{sockpp\+::tcp6\+\_\+acceptor}} = acceptor\+\_\+tmpl$<$tcp6\+\_\+socket$>$}



Class for creating a TCP v6 server. 

Objects of this class bind and listen on TCP ports for incoming connections. Normally, a server thread creates one of these and blocks on the call to accept incoming connections. The call to accept creates and returns a tcp6\+\_\+socket which can then be used for the actual communications.
